title: Best of the Best
review: My favorite movie of all time.. the original action/adventure blockbuster.. Harrison Ford has never been better.  Pure fun for everyone.  They don't make movies like this anymore.  Besides, Indiana Jones kills Nazis. what could be better?

title: Wonderful
review: the most emotional movie I have ever seen, from start to finish,a masterpiece of cinema.  If your not crying, something is wrong.
